ticket.title: UJS-prototype: :confirm does not work on a button_to
ticket.original-body:
This issue seems to stem from rails.js only checking for data-confirm on the <form> element, and not on the button that is clicked.
Example code: <%= button_to 'confirm', example_path, :confirm => 'Are you sure?'%>
